attributes.action: Stop all cuts in Rural public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this Government is sincere in its aims to reduce pollution then they need to stem the reduction in local bus services.  If there is a service with cheap fares people will be encouraged to leave their own vehicles at home and use public transport.  The fares must be within the means of those that can less afford to pay.
